text:
HubSpot css minifier has issues with @supports
HS Devs this query: `@supports((display: -ms-grid) or (display: grid)){`

gets minified as
`@supports((display: -ms-grid) or(display: grid)) {`
subtle but the minifier strips the space after the `or` breaking the query.

Due to a tight deadline I can’t wait for the bug fix, so I’m going to work around it, please try to fix that, I use @supports all the time, and garuntee I and others will run into that again.
